RT @marcorubio Foreign policy is complicated because it requires both idealism & realism.

As we debate #YemenResolution in Senate I hope we realize that while we must hold #MBS accountable for #KhashoggiMurder we must also deal with what #Iran is doing in #Yemen

RT @JimmyGomezCA “I don't think he knows what to do with a strong woman," Rep. Jimmy Gomez (D-Calif.) told us. “His actions just showed that he’s a chauvinist when it comes to dealing with women in power.” https://twitter.com/powerpost/status/1072813257122029574 QT @PowerPost “One of the things that stood out to me, was him calling her 'Nancy, Nancy, Nancy.' That’s Speaker @NancyPelosi to you, punk,” @RepJimmyGomez said of @realDonaldTrump https://www.washingtonpost.com/news/powerpost/paloma/powerup/2018/12/12/powerup-nancy-pelosi-is-in-the-no-mansplaining-zone-when-it-comes-to-president-trump/5c1009411b326b2d6629d437/?tid=ss_tw&utm_term=.80d41ce3505f

https://www.theatlantic.com/politics/archive/2018/09/elizabeth-warrens-fix-americas-housing-crisis/571210/

Dictators around the world are shelling out millions of dollars to Washington lobbyists to try and curry favor with @realDonaldTrump. My plan to #EndCorruptionNow would ban Americans from lobbying on behalf of foreign governments. https://www.nytimes.com/2018/12/10/us/politics/sanctions-lobbyists-usa.html
RT @marthamaccallum Tonight @TheStoryFNC @TGowdySC exit interview and @marcorubio joins me. Don’t miss it.

RT @GregShugar For months, I advocated for a new Democratic Leader in the House. 

I said that @NancyPelosi was part of the old guard. That new blood was needed. That it was someone else’s turn.

Today, I say...I was wrong. Pelosi crushed it. She showed savvy, poise and acumen.  #TeamPelosi

Families seeking asylum in San Diego who have fled violence and persecution need our help. Please make a donation to help provide food and medical care for these families: https://www.gofundme.com/migrantreliefsd

In case you missed my interview last night on @FoxNews with @seanhannity where I discussed criminal justice reform, watch it here --> http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1072965945830858752/pu/img/6WPwRR9dWQrTfcVb.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1072965945830858752/pu/vid/320x180/gnDE5IRY5fMf1Zw9.mp4?tag=6
People die every day in America simply because they cannot afford medical care. That’s wrong—and why I support Medicare for All. Everyone deserves access to quality, affordable health care.

RT @celesteperron I see lots of love for @NancyPelosi today, because she so expertly owned Trump over his wall nonsense, but I love her because she was home in her district less than 48 hours earlier comforting survivors at the @MomsDemand vigil. RT @RosLehtinen Thank you, @SenTedCruz! You have been a champion of the #NicaAct + I am proud of what we have accomplished together for the people of #Nicaragua. #Ortega’s reign of impunity from years of abuses + corruption will soon come to an end. https://twitter.com/sentedcruz/status/1072602014322974720 QT @SenTedCruz I have been proud to work alongside @RosLehtinen & our colleagues in the House and Senate to pursue meaningful democratic reform and combat human rights abuses in #Nicaragua.

Today the U.S. Senate will vote on whether to end US support for the devastating Saudi-led war in Yemen. 

This would be the first time ever that the Senate has voted to end an unauthorized war. 

We must finally end US involvement in this humanitarian and strategic disaster.

Congress overwhelmingly passed the #NICAAct. We are one step closer to expanding sanctions and other pressures against the oppressive Ortega regime. I look forward to @POTUS promptly signing this bill into law. https://www.rubio.senate.gov/public/index.cfm?p=Press-Releases&id=54553D36-B16E-427C-8AD4-ED36FB1892ED

It is not in our interests to have high tech equipment sold to the Ayatollah. If Huawei was engaged in that – my understanding is there is significant evidence that there was – then I’m glad we have an administration enforcing that. http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1072925250382381056/img/4sLdZabZ2k4D0Bir.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1072925250382381056/vid/320x180/jAyGG_hjpho4oyXx.mp4?tag=9

I look forward to voting in support of this bill. https://www.usatoday.com/story/news/politics/2018/12/11/criminal-justice-reform-mitch-mcconnell/2275332002/

As early as today, my fellow Floridians in #FloridaPanhandle & #TampaBay area will have surprising & unwelcome visitors just off our coasts. Two long range #Russian bombers taking off from #Venezuela & patrolling over the Gulf of Mexico at the invitation of Nicolas Maduro #Sayfie
We cannot follow the lead of the despotic regime in Saudi Arabia any longer. We must end U.S. support for the disastrous Saudi-led war in Yemen today.

RT @AriFleischer Justice is based on investigating crimes and connecting them to people. But if that patrol extends to flying into & over the Gulf of Mexico it would be an extremely provocative move he may soon come to regret.

Last year, @WellsFargo CEO Tim Sloan told me he really values his employees. Since then, he’s announced plans to fire more than 20k of them while dedicating $60 billion to stock buybacks for shareholders (like himself). I’d say it’s pretty clear what he values. https://twitter.com/nowthisnews/status/1072276777328959488 QT @nowthisnews Sen. Warren predicted layoffs at Well Fargo a year before they happened http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1072238862024339456/img/lWDmmLlYFULB4IiF.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1072238862024339456/vid/320x320/PCIYrtu7rKCcoWsX.mp4?tag=9
Trump’s border wall would be an absolute waste of taxpayer money. I won’t support it.

SOON: Speaking on the floor on the retirement of my friend and colleague, @SenBillNelson. We have made great strides as a bipartisan team helping #Florida. I wish him the best as he leaves the Senate.  (1/2)

From the #STOPSchoolViolenceAct to the #PuertoRicoEconomicEmpowermentAct, @senorrinhatch and I have worked together to make this country better. I will miss my friend and mentor greatly. The state of #Utah has been lucky to have such a dedicated senator.

Let us show the world today that the U.S. Senate recognizes that real American power does not come from our ability to blow things up, but from our ability to bring people together.

We must finally end US support for the disastrous Saudi-led war in Yemen.

The time is long overdue for the United States to stop following the lead of Saudi Arabia. The Senate must reassert its constitutional authority and vote today to end our support for this unauthorized, unconstitutional, and disastrous Saudi-led war in Yemen.

RT @DaleMurden Thanks to @JohnCornyn and @SenTedCruz on voting for the #farm bill yesterday.  Important for #citrus in its fight against #HLB and important for all #specialtycrops nationwide. Thank you gentlemen.

Make no mistake: Breathing clean air should be a basic human right, not a partisan issue. Making it easier for corporations to pollute our air will have significant repercussions for the American people's health and for our planet's future.
